Title: Relates to access to certain record by a federal agency acting in its official capacity; repealer
Summary: Requires the commissioner of motor vehicles to disclose certain records to a requesting federal agency acting in its official capacity.
LawCode: Amd ยง201, rpld ยง201 sub 12, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to access to certain record by a federal agency acting in its official capacity; and to repeal certain provisions of such law related thereto
